description:
Nucleon Databsae Master is a modern and powerfull database management and admin tool for MongoDB, NuoDB, Oracle, MySQL, PostgreSQL, FireBird, SQLite, SQL Server, SQL Azure, 
	Apache Hive, DB2, Informix, Netezza, TeraData, Ingres, OData, Plant3D, Google Analytics, Rest/Soap/Web Services, .Net Objects, SharePoint, ShapeFile and XML files.
	It enables you to browse and edit data, create and edit tables, views, procedures, triggers and other database objects.
author: Nucleon Software
